NAME

Dist::Zilla::MintingProfile::Author::Plicease - Minting profile for Plicease

VERSION

version 2.71

SYNOPSIS

 dzil new -P Author::Plicease Module::Name

DESCRIPTION

This is the normal minting profile used by Plicease.

AUTHOR

Graham Ollis <plicease@cpan.org>
